Articles.Content:
Evening all

I recently discovered KSP and after enjoying the demo I purchased the full game through Steam.

Been mainly messing about in sandbox getting to know the controls and how to play.

After getting two capsules stuck in orbit I decided it was time for a rescue mission. I went about designing and testing rockets to meet the mission parameters. After several steps I am happy with my design, I saved my design then rescued my first capsule.

This evening I thought I would attempt rescue number two but I cannot load my rocket. I enter the VAB and I can select the load button and my rocket is listed in amongst a number of others (I presume these are stock design as they are not mine). The problem is that when I select my design nothing appears in the VAB.

I have Engineer Redux and Chatterer installed.

Could anyone help please? I don't want to have to build my rocket from scratch each time.
